text: wadhkr hin 'amrina almalayikat balsjwd ladm, tahiatan lah la ebadt, wa'umirna 'iiblis bima 'umiru bh, fasajad almalayikat jmyeana, lkn 'iiblis aldhy kan min aljini kharaj ean taeat rbh, walam yasjud kibrana whsdana. aftjelwnh -ayha alnas- wadhuriyatah aewanana lakum ttyewnhm wttrkwn taety, wahum 'aladu aedaykm? qabuhat taeat alzaalimin lilshaytan badalaan ean taeat alrhmn
